plot outline: Pandiyarajan joins as a teacher in a village school. He stays as a tenant in Nanditha's house and starts loving her. Ponnambalam is uncle of Nanditha and his only aim is to get married to Nanditha. Nandhitha's dad insults Ponnambalam as he is illiterate. Ponnambalam requests Pandiyarajan to help him, so that he can marry Nanditha.
title: Thiru Thiru
plot: Pandiyarajan joins as a teacher in a village school. He stays as a tenant in Nanditha's house and starts loving her. Ponnambalam is uncle of Nanditha and his only aim is to get married to Nanditha. Nandhitha's dad insults Ponnambalam as he is illiterate.
